New Records: The White Sox are tied with the Mets for most games lost in a season in the modern era at 120.
Key Match Events: Chicago White Sox beat the Los Angeles Angels 7-0 at Guaranteed Rate Field.
The White Sox swept the series 3-0 against the Angels.
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox were sitting on a record-tying 120 losses, and their next loss would make them the most losing team in modern MLB history.
